name: Dinosaur Disaster
description:
MADE FOR LD50

Theme: Delay the Inevitable

Description:

In DINOSAUR DISASTER you take on the role of a Diplodocus attempting to save its kind from mass extinction. Eat shrubbery and grow large enough to knock the earth out of the path of a giant asteroid! Watch out for lava, it hurts! Don't eat the cacti without fruit on them, they also hurt! Find your pals for bonus clout.

Use Alt+Enter to go into fullscreen.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrows to move.
  • Move to other areas by moving off the edge of the screen.
  • Eat trees by bumping into them.
  • Rescue pals by bumping into them.
  • Die to lava by bumping into it.

Credits:

Music:  @cheapshot

Art: @anticdope

Code: @heyo_sean
